title: The Further Adventures of the Owl and the Pussy-cat
description: The Owl and the Pussy-cat embark on more escapades in a fanciful sequel by a celebrated author.In this original sequel to The Owl and the Pussy-cat, someone steals the ring from Pussy-cat's tail, and the newlyweds must travel far from the safety of the Bong-tree glade to search for the thief. Follow the familiar couple on a wonderful new adventure by Julia Donaldson, illustrated by award-winning artist Charlotte Voake.
author: Julia Donaldson
